dict.acceptation: 堂[表]兄弟姊妹；远亲，同辈；

sent.orig: There his cousin, Gilbert, resented this cousin from the Middle West.
sent.trans: 但表兄基尔伯特对这位来自中西部的表弟很不满。

sent.orig: My second cousin once removed is the child of my second cousin.
sent.trans: 我的表亲的下一代即为我表亲的子女。

sent.orig: He is my cousin or rather my 'father's cousin.
sent.trans: 他是我表弟--我是说是我父亲的表弟。

sent.orig: I have always lived in my cousin the cousin and I are always answered the phone.
sent.trans: 我经常在我表姐家住，经常都是我表姐接电话的。

sent.orig: Danny is babysitting his cousin Debbie at the playground.
sent.trans: 丹尼在照顾操场上的黛比表妹。
